name: Gruesome Slaughter
text: You can inspire extreme revulsion when you slaughter your enemies.
prerequisites: Intimidating Prowess, Killing Flourish, Intimidate 11 ranks, slayer level 11th.
benefit: Creatures you demoralize by using the Killing Flourish feat must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + the higher of your Strength or Dexterity modifier) or become sickened for 1 minute.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the DC of the effect by an amount equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你反手一刀就将刺杀目标斩成鲜血淋漓，在场的所有人都被吓得半死。
prerequisites_zh: 威逼（Intimidating Prowess），处刑秀（Killing Flourish），威吓技能11级，杀手等级11。
benefit_zh: 每当你使用 专长进行一次挫败士气的威吓尝试，受到影响的生物就必须一个一个DC=10+你角色等级一半+你的力量或敏捷调整值（取其高者）的强韧检定，否则将陷入恶心一分钟。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来提升这个效果的DC，提升的点数等于你消耗的耐力。
